root.description: Rfactor 2 is the upcoming simulation in the Rfactor series by ISI. Many new community demanded features have been added. Such as Dynamic weatherTrack based weatherReal time environmental maps (IE car reflections)Modeled and animated first person driver arms/handsDynamic lighting with dynamic time changesEasy mod conversionBetter mod supportAbility to modify the UITracks that feature physically modeled bumps, dips and micro-deformationsDirt RacingUpgraded AIUpgraded physicsÂ There are also several mods already in development, such as the Super GT 2 mod. Which will cover the GT500 class in the Japanese Super GT series as well as famous GT class cars.
